alert.note: Alert for Sheep Range; Spring Mountains-Red Rock Canyon (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 16 at 3:27PM PST until January 17 at 4:00PM PST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM PST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to 3 inches. Winds gusting as high as 55 mph. * WHERE...Sheep Range and Spring Mountains-Red Rock Canyon. * WHEN...Until 4 PM PST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches.
info.instruction: A Winter Storm Warning for snow means severe winter weather conditions will make travel very hazardous or impossible. If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Sheep Range; Spring Mountains-Red Rock Canyon
